title: I really do like base R plotting
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
I have to admit, I really do like building plots with classic, base R functions.
First, you don’t have to build a dataframe, but it inot tidy format, or whatever. Make some vectors and BAM! You’re done.
Here’s some data from a classic study of deer in the George Reserve in Michigan.
Type it in and done.

title: Welcome to Computational Biology for All!
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Computational Biology for All!. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!

title: Scatterplot case study: Ecological succession in Mexico
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Data were extracted from Figure 2a of Lebrija-Trejos et al. (2008) using metaDigitise.

(Intercept)        Year 
 17.2543498   0.8344402 


References
Lebrija-Trejos et al. Successional Change and Resilience of a Very Dry Tropical Deciduous Forest Following Shifting Agriculture. Biotropica 40: 422–431. 10.1111/j.1744-7429.2008.00398.x.
